description: This is an example configuration file with all supported devices. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file containing devices you actually own.

accessories.name: Alarm
accessories.description: Arm, disarm, and status monitoring of the default partition for Honeywell/Ademco alarm systems. Requires network configured AD2USB interface

accessories.name: Leaf
accessories.description: This shim supports controlling climate control on Nissan cars with Carwings. Note that Carwings is super slow and it may take up to 5 minutes for your command to be processed by the Carwings system.

accessories.name: Security System
accessories.description: Allows basic control of Elk M1 security system. You can use 1 of 3 arm modes: Away, Stay, Night. If you need to access all 3, create 3 accessories with different names.

accessories.name: Light
accessories.description: Control HomeMatic devices (The XMP-API addon for the CCU is required)
accessories.ccu_id: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device
accessories.ccu_ip: The IP-Adress of your HomeMatic CCU device

accessories.name: Contact
accessories.description: Control HomeMatic devices (The XMP-API addon for the CCU is required)
accessories.ccu_id_TargetTemp: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-CC-RT-DN )
accessories.ccu_id_CurrentTemp: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-CC-RT-DN )
accessories.ccu_id_ControlMode: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-CC-RT-DN )
accessories.ccu_id_ManuMode: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-CC-RT-DN )
accessories.ccu_id_AutoMode: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-CC-RT-DN )
accessories.ccu_ip: The IP-Adress of your HomeMatic CCU device

accessories.name: Contact
accessories.description: Control HomeMatic devices (The XMP-API addon for the CCU is required)
accessories.ccu_id: The XMP-API id of your HomeMatic device (type HM-Sec-RHS)
accessories.ccu_ip: The IP-Adress of your HomeMatic CCU device

accessories.name: Tesla
accessories.description: This shim supports controlling climate control on the Tesla Model S.

accessories.name: mpd
accessories.description: Allows some control of an MPD server
